channel.title: Starcraft 2 split into 3 separate games
channel.description:
http://www.evilavatar.com/forums/showthread.php?t=66991
Today, Blizzard has announced that Starcraft 2 will be split into three separate games, one for each race's campaign.
I really hope each campaign isn't going to be paper thin now. The games better be $25-35 each at least, not full price.

item.title: Starcraft 2 split into 3 separate games
item.dc:creator: @postmanpat9 postmanpat9
item.description:
@postmanpat9 wrote:

[quote=“VB7 Rocks, post:2, topic:236098”]I think it’s just a way for them to make more money.

(By the way, separate is spelled with an ‘a’.)[/quote]
Sorry 'bout that typo.

Read full topic
